Address.value: 10 HUDSON YARDS, NEW YORK, New York, 10001, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tapestry, Inc. is an American multinational luxury fashion holding company. It is based in New York City and is the parent company of three major brands: Coach New York, Kate Spade New York and Stuart Weitzman. Originally named Coach, Inc., the business changed its name to Tapestry on October 31, 2017.
